mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* from ( SELECT f.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM freeboard_comment fc WHERE fc.freeboard_no = f.freeboard_no) commentCnt ,(SELECT count(*) FROM freeboard_recommend fr WHERE fr.board_no = f.freeboard_no) recommendCnt , u.user_nick FROM freeboard f INNER JOIN user_tb u ON f.user_no = u.user_no WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY f.freeboard_no DESC ) B ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} and #{endNo}
mapper.update: update freeboard set freeboard_hit = freeboard_hit+1 where freeboard_no = #{freeboard_no}
